abstract: For the New York Times staff photographer Tyler Hicks, war is no more and no less than who is near and whatever happens. C. J. Chivers reports on Mr. Hicks's photographs from the Afghan war over the past decade.
snippet: For the New York Times staff photographer Tyler Hicks, war is no more and no less than who is near and whatever happens. C. J. Chivers reports on Mr. Hicks's photographs from the Afghan war over the past decade.

headline.main: Tyler Hicks: A Decade in Afghanistan
